description.default: After using the picgo plugin to upload images to the remote server, replace the local image path in the notebook with the remote URL.
description.zh_CN: 在使用picgo插件上传图片至远端之后，远端url替换笔记本地图片路径
description.en_US: After using the picgo plugin to upload images to the remote server, replace the local image path in the notebook with the remote URL.
